QuestData.Title: Killclaw the Terrible
QuestData.Description:
<You see a crude sign made by the ogres. It contains a warning.>
BIG bear! Bad!
Big bear guard big ogre treasure!
Kill after ritual! Get treasure, make more power!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Killclaw is a strong beast, you'll need some friends to defeat it!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Look for the treasure within Killclaw's cave.
QuestData.RewardText: <You find a cache of treasure, just like the ogres' sign mentioned!>
